summary: Relating to land use and zoning and amending Sections 3.14, 3.26, 4.1 & 22.4 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300); redefining "motel"; replacing definitions of "front yard", rear yard", "side yard" and required yards" with definitions of "yard", required front yard", "required rear yard" and "required side yards"; modifying procedures to be followed in determination of zone boundard lines and modifying special side yard requirements for buildings over 50 feet in length in R Zone.
